item.title: Who wants to see Auxy make some tunes?
item.dc:creator: Produk
item.description:
@Auxy I challenge you to a beat the clock style contest. Make a 1 minute song with the sounds Bold, Silk, Lobster, Igloo, Charge, and Whack. You can have as many duplicates of each sound as you need. You may edit each sound as much as you choose. Beta features are allowed

Upload the finished track to soundcloud and post the link here.
Anyone else who wants to compete, feel free to.

I call this…yeah idk what to call it.

Read full topic
item.source: Who wants to see Auxy make some tunes?
